problem: 如图,AB,AC,BD是⊙O的切线,切点分别是P,C,D．若AC=5,BD=3,则AB的长是()
answer: 解:∵AB,AC,BD是⊙O的切线,切点分别是P,C,D．∴AP=AC,BD=BP,∴AB=AP+BP=AC+BD,∵AC=5,BD=3,∴AB=5+3=8．故选:D．
comment: 本题考查圆的切线的性质,解题的关键是掌握切线长定理．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB, AC, BD are the tangents of ⊙O. If AC = N_0, BD = N_1, then the length of AB is ()
